api

Class FoursquareManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.FoursquareManager

  • public class FoursquareManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class consists of methods that use the Foursquare API in order to get different information that is related to venues/locations. Can only be instantiated as a Singleton.
    Author:
    Tudor-Daniel Sirbu, Claudiu Tarta, Florin-Cristian Gavrila

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FoursquareManager()

      • queryByLocation

        public fi.foyt.foursquare.api.entities.CompactVenue[] queryByLocation(java.lang.String locationLat,
                                                             java.lang.String locationLong)
        Checks what venues are around the given latitude and longitude.
        Parameters:
        locationLat - the latitude to use in the location.
        locationLong - the longitude to use in the location.
        Returns:
        a list of compact venues.

      • getVenues

        public fi.foyt.foursquare.api.entities.CompactVenue[] getVenues(java.lang.String location)
        This method returns the venues that are in the proximity of the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - the name of the location to get the proximal venues for.
        Returns:
        a list of compact venues.

      • getVenuesList

        public fi.foyt.foursquare.api.entities.CompleteVenue[] getVenuesList(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchParams)
                                                              throws fi.foyt.foursquare.api.FoursquareApiException
        The method searches for a venues given some search parameters.
        Parameters:
        searchParams - https://developer.foursquare.com/docs/venues/search
        Returns:
        List of venues that match the query
        Throws:
        fi.foyt.foursquare.api.FoursquareApiException

        Returns:
